articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Egypt Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Egypt Appointed
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Ri Hyok Chol was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Egypt, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
						
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Agricultural and Forestry Workers Union of China headed by Sheng Mingfu, President of the National Committee of the union, arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Stamp Commemorating Birthday of Universal Postal Union Published
articles.content:
Stamp Commemorating Birthday of Universal Postal Union Published
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has issued an individual stamp in commemoration of the 135th anniversary of the foundation of the Universal Postal Union.
					Figured on the stamp are the emblem of the UPU and mail-carriers.
					
					The DPRK joined the union in June Juche 63 (1974).
					
					Four individual stamps showing insects spreading in different countries and regions of the world were also issued.

articles.title: New Waste Matter Disposal Device Introduced
articles.content:
New Waste Matter Disposal Device Introduced
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Environmental Conservation Institute under the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation of the DPRK has recently developed a pathogenic waste matter disposal device.
					 The device can dispose of pathogenic bacteria-contaminated waste matters from hospital including injector and bandage with abundant home materials in accordance with the actual conditions.
					
					 Such waste matters have been buried or burnt in general. The air polluted by acrid smoke has a harmful influence on human body and natural environment.
					
					 Scientists completed successfully the device by resolving technological issues such as the method of raising its natural ventilation capacity and the rational selection of filter layer place.
					
					 The device with two combustion tubes and an exhaust pipe is profitable for its simple structure and no consumption of electricity.
					
					 The device has been introduced into Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital No. 2 and other units to pay off profusely.

articles.title: Samjiyon Music Band
articles.content:
Samjiyon Music Band
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A performance by the Samjiyon Music Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe left deep impressions on the Korean and foreign audience.
					 The music band put on the stage commemorating the Day of the Sun this year revolutionary and militant songs, songs reflecting the life of the Korean people, impressive movie theme songs, songs created in the period of enlightenment and others.
					
					 The audience was deeply impressed by its instrumentalists' and singers' refined artistic talent, unaffected acting on the stage and soft rhythmic movement.
					
					 On the basis of a unique formation of musical instruments, the performers put on the stage rich orchestra with bright, graceful and deep philosophy, fresh and amusing instrumental concert and wonderful instrumental solo with high virtuosity and delicate depiction.
					
					 The performers in the glittering and beautiful costume suitable to the emotional feelings inherent to the Korean nation deepened rapport with the spectators with their natural acting. The stream of the performance was also unique.
					
					 The band depicts well the spirit of serving the people, national character, high standard of artistry, popularity and modern aesthetic tastes in the arrangement of musical pieces. 
					
					 The stage is arranged in a new and convenient way for appreciation to suit the size of the formation of musical instruments and acoustic conditions and the lighting technique and effect are also multifarious to be adapted to the emotional stream of music.
					
					 It is a pride of the nation to have the Samjiyon Music Band, a peculiar and excellent art troupe of Korean style.

articles.title: Battle between "Punitive" Forces
articles.content:
Battle between "Punitive" Forces
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- It is a story when the unit under the headquarters of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army led by President Kim Il Sung arrived at Hongtushanzi with the Japanese imperialist "punitive" force on its heels one day in January Juche 28 (1939).
					 At the sunset the unit was circling the mountain for the second time to put the chasing enemy off the scent before another "punitive" force appeared in front.
					
					 Deciding to destroy the enemies by telescope tactics, the President ordered the unit to slip off sideways by treading fallen trees.
					
					 A little while later, a few shots rang out to be followed by the exchange of fierce fire from the place where the unit had just been marching.
					
					 When the chasing enemy found unexpectedly a "punitive" force marching toward it in darkness, it was surprised and jumped the gun, taking the latter for the KPRA unit coming in a counterattack under the cover of darkness.
					
					 The newly appeared "punitive" force of the Japanese imperialists, suffering a heavy loss from the first blow, fell upon the other with a dagger in its mouth.
					
					 The hour-long fighting ended in heavy casualties. Finding belatedly that they had firing at their own men, they let out shrill cries, struck dumb.
					
					 The President would defeat the enemy completely with his telescope tactics during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.

articles.title: Aim Sought by U.S. in Its Promise to Provide "Nuclear Umbrella" to S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Aim Sought by U.S. in Its Promise to Provide "Nuclear Umbrella" to S. Korea Disclose
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The United States invited traitor Lee Myung Bak to the White House recently and clarified in a document that it would provide south Korea with "extended nuclear deterrence" including a "nuclear umbrella".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The promise made by the U.S. to provide a "nuclear umbrella" to its "allies" is, in essence, a theory of preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					Lurking behind the U.S. promise to provide a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea is a criminal scenario to spark a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula on a legitimate basis. 
					
					 The moves of the U.S. bellicose forces to tighten the nuclear conspiracy and nexus with south Korea suggest that they are keen to drive its puppets into military provocations against the DPRK and launch an all-out nuclear war on the peninsula at any cost, availing themselves of the opportunity. 
					
					 The U.S. chief executive was so brazen-faced as to utter that he was "repeatedly urging north Korea to make efforts for non-proliferation" when talking about the offer of "extended nuclear deterrence" to south Korea.
					
					 It is a brigandish logic for the U.S. to urge the DPRK to dismantle its nukes despite its advocacy of the theory of preemptive nuclear attack, while talking about the provision of a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK was entirely right when it conducted nuclear tests and bolstered up nuclear deterrent for self-defence in order to cope with the moves frantically stepped up by the U.S. for a nuclear war while providing for years a guarantee for the offer of a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to properly approach the DPRK as it has emerged a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it calculates it can go safe after starting a war on the Korean Peninsula in disregard of the hard reality.

articles.title: South Korean Puppets' Reckless War Outbursts Assailed
articles.content:
South Korean Puppets' Reckless War Outbursts Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Brass hats of the south Korean puppet military including the "chief of the general staff of the navy," attending an event "commemorating the anniversary of the West Sea incident" on June 15, let loose a spate of bellicose remarks such as "annihilation" and the "third West Sea skirmish" and "frustration of provocations on the spot."
					 Earlier, the puppet minister of National Defence of south Korea at a "meeting of ministers in charge of diplomacy and security" let loose a whole string of reckless remarks inciting confrontation with the DPRK, crying out for a "resolute counter-action."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 These provocative remarks of the puppets reminding one of the eve of a war are nothing but deliberate moves to strain the situation in a bid to spark off the third armed conflict in the West Sea.
					
					 The "Northern Limit Line" unilaterally marked by the U.S. in the West Sea right after the ceasefire is an illegal ghost-like line. There exists in the waters of the West Sea the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the West Sea fixed and proclaimed by the DPRK in accordance with the norms of international law and as required by the reality in which the north and the U.S. are standing in military confrontation.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the puppets are coiling up the tension to an extreme phase, persistently insisting they would stick to the "Northern Limit Line" to the last though it is a source of clashes. This is a very dangerous reckless act to spark off a military conflict there and use it as a pretext for starting a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces made the Armistice Agreement toothless, depriving the Korean Peninsula of any legal and institutional mechanism for controlling military conflicts between the two sides. Worse still, the situation in the West Sea is so tense that even the slightest incident may trigger off a clash. 
					
					 It is the height of the folly for the group of traitors to go reckless in its moves to spark off the third West Sea armed conflict, letting loose a spate of reckless provocative remarks against the DPRK.
					
					 Should the south Korean puppets finally launch a war of aggression against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialists, they will not be able to escape the fate of forlorn wandering spirits in face of deadly retaliatory blows of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: People with Great Mental Power Always Sure to Triumph
articles.content:
People with Great Mental Power Always Sure to Triumph
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- It is the unique revolutionary theory of the Workers' Party of Korea that the people are always sure to triumph when they are awakened and motivated ideologically. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a jointly signed article.
					
					 The prosperity of the country and the dignity of the nation depend on the mental power of its people, the driving force of the country, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Strong mental power of the popular masses amounts to the greatest treasure of the nation which cannot be bartered for any amount of wealth and serves as a weapon more powerful than a nuclear weapon.
					
					 There are now not a few countries in the world which wish to become political powers, counting on their strong military capacity, tremendous economic power and huge scientific and technological potentials. These are, however, not enough for emerging independent powers. If the people of a country are divided ideologically and morally no matter what powerful military muscle and developed economic potential it has, it cannot escape the fate of a political servant for other countries. This is the stark reality proved by the international politics. A country with the great people possessed of strong mental power can claim to be a country with strong national power.
					
					 Building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation means, in essence, a process for training the popular masses into people strong in the spirit of independence and building a powerful driving force for the cause of the nation-building.
					
					 The on-going general advance to usher in a new heyday of Songun Korea represents, first of all, a general advance for helping its people fully equip themselves with the political and ideological traits of the people of a thriving nation.
					
					 Mental power serves as the most powerful weapon as it helps the people win sure victory in the stand off with the imperialists standing in the way of building a thriving nation.
					
					 It is because of this great mental power hardly found in the people of any other countries that the Korean people are recognized as invincible and heroic people by the world. 
					
					 The mental power of the Korean people is an expression of their noblest thought and sentiment of absolutely trusting and following the headquarters of the revolution and a manifestation of their strong national self-esteem with which they are advancing into the world with pride and a display of their total dedication to the work for carving out a rosy future.
					
					 The article calls on the people to give full play to the tremendous mental power which has been built in the course of Songun and let this year witness great changes, many good signs and landmark turns.

articles.title: Peace on Korean Peninsula Achievable Only through Struggle
articles.content:
Peace on Korean Peninsula Achievable Only through Struggle
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans should dynamically turn out in the struggle for peace against war in order to foil the war moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad and thus   preserve the peace on the Korean Peninsula and accomplish the cause of national historic significance for independent reunification, peace and prosperity without fail, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their lackeys south Korean authorities' persistent confrontation with the DPRK and moves for a war of aggression against it are the basic factors of disturbing the peace on the Korean Peninsula. Peace can be achieved only through a resolute struggle against the aggression and war. 
					
					 The Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are a driving force in the struggle for peace against war. 
					
					 The Songun politics of the DPRK serves as a banner of the nation-wide struggle for defending the peace on the peninsula. 
					
					 It is an exercise of the right to self-defense for the DPRK to bolster up its revolutionary armed forces to cope with the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves to ignite a new war and firmly defend the security of the country and the people. 
					
					Had the DPRK failed to increase its war deterrent for self-defence under the uplifted banner of Songun in every way, a nuclear war would have already broken out on the peninsula and Koreans would have suffered an unspeakably horrible disaster. Indeed, Songun serves as a powerful treasured sword for preserving the peace of the country and the security of the Koreans and paving the way of carving out the independent destiny of the nation. 
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad desirous of the peace of the country and peaceful reunification should positively support the Songun politics of the DPRK with warm patriotism irrespective of ideology and ism and wage a more dynamic struggle for peace against war under its banner.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Plan for North-Targeted War Exercises Announced
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Plan for North-Targeted War Exercises Announced
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Command of the First Army Corps of the south Korean puppet ground force on June 19 announced that it would stage "exercises for implementing an operational plan reminiscent of the June 25 war" in all parts of Kangwon Province of south Korea on June 24 and 25, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The warmongers are contemplating staging a large-scale north- targeted war exercises involving all units of the army such as forces of the corps, divisions and brigades under the command, unhesitatingly letting loose a spate of such outbursts as "provocation" of someone and "prompt retaliation on the spot".
					
					 They blustered that those large military drills including occupation of enemy positions and commanding posts, transport of war materiel and air battle would be staged day and night under the simulated conditions of an actual war during the exercises.
					
					 Meanwhile, the second army corps of the puppet ground force is planning to stage large mobile exercises involving huge armed forces such as troops, tanks, armored cars and trucks in the areas of Chunchon, Hwachon and Hongchon in Kangwon Province of south Korea from June 22 to 26.

articles.title: S. Korea-U.S. "Alliance" for Aggression Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. "Alliance" for Aggression Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on June 18 denouncing the dangerous scheme of the U.S. and traitor Lee Myung Bak to strengthen their "alliance" for aggression.
					 The statement charged that during his junket to the U.S. Lee Myung Bak devised a "joint version statement" for boosting the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" in conspiracy with his master.
					
					 This is a criminal act and challenge to the July 4 South-North Joint Statement, which calls for settling the problem of national reunification independently and peacefully and on the principle of great national unity, and all the agreements reached between the south and the north, it said.
					
					  It expressed resentment at the anti-national and anti-DPRK policy by the bellicose forces who are calling for intensified "alliance" for aggression aimed at threatening the peace of the Korean Peninsula, blocking the reunification and imposing nuclear disasters upon the nation.
					
					 The statement urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" not to resort to the sycophantic solicitation diplomacy but opt for thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Vigorous Struggle for Independent Reunification Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Vigorous Struggle for Independent Reunification Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea made public a resolution on June 13 at which it declared it would wage a vigorous struggle for the independent reunification in the "period of the movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration."
					 The resolution denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime for having totally denied the inter-Korean declarations and bedeviled the south-north relations and getting hell-bent on the wholesale suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic organizations.
					
					 It also charged that the regime is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a touch-and-go crisis through such actions as its full participation in the PSI, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It stressed that the solidarity would take the lead in the struggle to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Violation of Democracy Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Violation of Democracy Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Law professors of universities in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on June 19 protesting against the puppet prosecution's violation of democracy.
					 At the press conference professors condemned the prosecution for stamping out democracy while encroaching upon the freedom of expression and resorting to unreasonable investigation.
					
					 They charged that the prosecution keen to patronize the dictatorial "government" is openly threatening the people opposing the Lee Myung Bak "government's" unpopular rule and trying to block the growth of their forces.
					
					 Articles of Internet users, reports by "PDs", etc. which assailed the unjust economic policy of the authorities have become a target of the prosecution's investigation because these expressions evoked great repercussions from the popular masses and, accordingly, they were regarded as a threat to Lee Myung Bak's maintenance of dictatorial regime, they pointed out.
					
					 They said that law professors across south Korea have turned out in actions as they could no longer overlook the reality in which freedom of expression is being ruthlessly violated.
					
					 They demanded that the prosecution cancel the indictment against those makers of "PDs", stop the investigation into the struggle against conservative media and open to the public the records of investigation into the tragic case in Ryongsan.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Flayed for Environmental Destruction in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Flayed for Environmental Destruction in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- At least 450 civic and public organizations, including the Green Federation and the Confederation of Trade Unions, and four religious orders and opposition parties in south Korea inaugurated an "all-people measure committee for checking the project of destroying four large rivers and protecting them for life" on June 18 in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' environmental destruction moves.
					 A press conference was called in Seoul to declare the formation of the measure committee.
					
					 Speakers there charged that the Lee Myung Bak "government" is pushing forward the project for "adjusting four large rivers" with investment of an astronomical amount of funds, not content with having stamped out democracy and revived the fascist dictatorship.
					
					 They said that people from all walks of life declare to turn out in the struggle against the Lee "government's" unpopular rule after inaugurating the said solidarity organization, irrespective of ideology, affiliation, political parties and religious beliefs.
					
					 The formation of the measure committee is the start of the struggle for punishing the Lee "government", they said, stressing that the organization would hold a large-scale rally and conduct one-million signature campaign, etc.
					
					 Contending that only when the present "government" is forced to step down is it possible to protect the natural environment and the people's vital right, they called upon the people from all walks of life to vigorously turn out in the struggle for punishing Lee Myung Bak who reigns over the people.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand on Nuclear Issue Favored by Russians
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand on Nuclear Issue Favored by Russians
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Political figures of Russia expressed full support for the DPRK's principled stand on the nuclear issue.
					 Vladimir Zhirinovsky, deputy speaker of the State Duma and chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, said in an interview with Interfax on June 13 that deputies to the State Duma from the Liberal Democratic Party have expressed their dissatisfaction at Russia's refusal to exercise its veto on the UNSC's "resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 Russia should not have supported the "resolution," he said, stressing that the DPRK has the right to take steps for defending its state and people from the moves to isolate it.
					
					 Nina Alexandrovna Andreyeva, general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, in a statement on June 16 expressed full support for the stand of the DPRK, which decisively rejected the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" adopted under the coercion of the U.S.
					
					 The brazenfaced politicians of the U.S. should know that they can never bring down with the frantic "Fuehrer-style" politics the free people who are full of the determination and will to decisively stand up against the U.S. to defend the sovereignty and dignity of their state and nation, she stressed.

articles.title: Brigandish Deed of U.S. and Its Followers Lambasted
articles.content:
Brigandish Deed of U.S. and Its Followers Lambasted
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Un Bok, first vice-chairperson of the General Association of Koreans in China, made public a statement on June 19 rejecting the UNSC "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK cooked up at the instigation of the U.S.
					 The statement condemned the adoption of the UNSC "resolution" over the DPRK's underground nuclear test as a grave provocation and an unpardonable gangster-like act of violating the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 It expressed resentment at the brigandish logic that only a big country can have access to nukes while denying a sovereign state's legitimate right to launch satellite.
					
					 It warned that the arrogant behavior of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle by force the country loving its system and refusing to obey a big country would spark off strong counteractions of the world progressives and the Korean people.
					
					 We fully support the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry resolutely rejecting the UNSC "resolution 1874" faked up at the U.S. imperialists' instigation, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Sweden and Denmark on June 10 and 12 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Displayed in the venues were photos showing the feats of the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the Korean people's struggle.
					
					 Anders Karlsson, chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden, said at a meeting that Kim Jong Il has strengthened the WPK into an invincible party without vacillation in any storm and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist bulwark and a military power which faces down the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world.
					
					 He provided the inter-Korean summit in June 2000 for the first time in the history of its division and the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, thus inspiring all Koreans with hope for national reunification, the speaker stressed.
					
					  Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said at a meeting that the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration was the result of Kim Jong Il's very just and fair policy for the reunification and peace of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Urging the U.S. to stop the hostile policy and war exercises for aggression on the DPRK at once and withdraw its aggression armed forces from south Korea, he stressed that the Korean people under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il would surely win in the confrontation with the imperialists.
					
					 A congratulatory message and letter to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin on June 10 to mark the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 In an article titled "DPRK's single-minded unity and Kim Jong Il" the bulletin said that over the past 45 years single-minded unity of the Korean society has been consolidated in every way under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It noted that the revolutionary philosophy of single-minded unity was clarified for the first time in history by Kim Jong Il who found the original principle on socio-political organism and expounded the idea of unity around the leader, the top-intellect of the socio-political community.
					
					 He put the single-minded unity of the whole society on the highest level and the DPRK has won one victory after another in the revolution and construction with the might of single-minded unity, it said.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Egipto
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Egipto
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Hyok Chol fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en la Republica Arabe de Egipto.

articles.title: Editado nuevo sello por 135o aniversario de fundacion de UPU
articles.content:
Editado nuevo sello por 135o aniversario de fundacion de UPU
						
  Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ATCC) -- Fue editado en Corea un genero de sello individual dedicado al 135o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union Postal Universal (UPU).
					  En el sello estan dibujados el emblema de la UPU y los medios de transporte que se usan en la distribucion del correo.
					
					   La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea  ingreso en junio del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche en esta organizacion internacional.
					
					  Ademas, fueron editados otros 4 generos de sellos individuales que muestran los insectos de varios paises y regiones del mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica promesa de EE.UU. sobre "paraguas nuclear"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica promesa de EE.UU. sobre "paraguas nuclear"
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos invito al traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak y le oficializo documentalmente el ofrecimiento de las "fuerzas disuasivas de la proliferacion nuclear" incluyendo el "paraguas nuclear".
					  La promesa de EE.UU. de suministrar el "paraguas nuclear" a los "paises aliados" es, en su esencia, la teoria de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					  Detras de la misma promesa de EE.UU. hecha al Sur de Corea, esta el intento criminal de desencadenar legitimamente una guerra nuclear total en la Peninsula Coreana despues de provocar militarmente a la RPDC por conducto de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					 Lo mas cinico del caso es que el gobernante norteamericano dijo que "urgia repetidamente los esfuerzos del Norte de Corea por la no proliferacion" mientras hablaba del suministro de las "fuerzas disuasivas de la proliferacion nuclear" al Sur de Corea.
					
					 Parte de la logica de bandido la demanda de EE.UU. sobre la cancelacion nuclear de la RPDC porque es ese imperio el que preconiza la doctrina de ataque preventivo nuclear prometiendo entregar al Sur de Corea el "paraguas nuclear".
					
					 Si se toman en cuenta tales rancias maniobras de EE.UU. para la guerra nuclear que se tornan cada dia mas abiertas, resultan muy justos la prueba nuclear y el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					 EE.UU. debe tratar a la RPDC tomando en cuenta que esta ya es el pais digno  con  armas nucleares.
					
					  Seria un gran error si el imperio piensa salir ileso de la guerra que pretende desatar en la Peninsula Coreana subestimando tal status de la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena creciente belicismo anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena creciente belicismo anti-RPDC
 Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ATCC) -- En el llamado "acto conmemorativo del incidente del Mar Oeste" realizado el dia 15, el "jefe del Estado Mayor de las Fuerzas Maritimas" y otras cabecillas del ejercito titere surcoreano pronunciaron unas palabras belicosas como "aniquilamiento", "tercer conflicto armado en el Mar Oeste" y "poner fin en el acto a la provocacion".
					  Con anterioridad, en la "reunion de los ministros relacionados con la diplomacia y seguridad" el ministro de Defensa Nacional titere se atrevio a hablar de la "reaccion rotunda" fomentando el enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Estos disparates, que nos hacen pensar que estamos en visperas de la guerra, devienen evidentemente la premeditada maniobra para agravar la tension con el fin de provocar el tercer conflicto armado en el Mar Oeste, asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 22 y continua:
					
					  Es ilegal e fantasmal la "linea de limite al Norte" delineada arbitrariamente en el Mar Oeste por EE.UU. inmediatamente despues del armisticio de la pasada guerra coreana (en 1953).
					
					  Ahi existe solo la linea de demarcacion militar fijada y proclamada al mundo por la RPDC conforme al reglamento de la ley internacional y a la situacion real del enfrentamiento militar entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos agravan extremadamente la tension insistiendo en la "defensa de la "linea de limite al Norte", que deviene la causa de los conflictos.
					
					  Esto deviene un acto extremadamente peligroso para desatar un conflicto militar en ese lugar, que serviria de pretexto de la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					  Ahora, la Peninsula Coreana se halla en el estado indefenso ante la guerra en que debido a la quiebra del Acuerdo de Armisticio por EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas, no existe ningun aparato legal e institucional para controlar el conflicto armado.
					
					  En particular, en el Mar Oeste se dio una situacion muy tirante a punto de explosion.
					
					  Resulta muy ridiculo que la banda de los traidores surcoreanos buscara el tercer conflicto armado en ese mar haciendo discursos provocativos a la RPDC.
					
					  Si esos titeres desatan por fin la guerra contra la RPDC en contubernio con los imperialistas yanquis, se convertiran en los cadaveres abandonados ante el poderoso y anonadante golpe de represalia de la segunda.
